View

Class GraficaECG

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • View.GraficaECG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GraficaECG
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Panel que almacena la grafica de ecg con sus adicionales para poder observarlo en su totalidad
    Version:
    Final
    Author:
    HeartLight
    See Also:
    JSpinner, JFreeChart, JSlider, XYSeriesCollection, XYPlot, Serialized Form
